comments.body:
The current target makefiles don't set a very good example, but I'd recommend only adding PLATFORM_FLAGS that are not part of the top-level Makefile.

My guess is:
```
  PLATFORM_FLAGS = \
    -DGEMMLOWP_ALLOW_SLOW_SCALAR_FALLBACK \
    -DTF_LITE_MCU_DEBUG_LOG \
    -fmessage-length=0 \
    -fno-exceptions \
    -fno-unwind-tables \
    -ffunction-sections \
    -fdata-sections \
    -funsigned-char \
    -mthumb \
    -fomit-frame-pointer
```

And then add any additional flags to the CORTEX_M_CORE blocks.
